input.label: Select Application
input.populatingSearch: sourcetype="DASP4" | where isnotnull(applicationID) | stats values(application) AS "app"

table.title: Traffic Logs
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="DASP4" application="$application$" | convert ctime(_time) as date timeformat="%d/%m/%Y" | convert ctime(_time) as time timeformat="%H:%M:%S" | table date,time,source_ip,application,HTTP_response_code,HTTP_method,bytes_received,bytes_sent,URL,URL_options | rename date AS "Date", time AS "Time",source_ip AS "Source",application AS "Application",HTTP_response_code AS "Code", HTTP_method AS "Method", bytes_received AS "Bytes In", bytes_sent AS "Bytes Out", URL AS "URL", URL_options AS "Parameters"
